abstract: Charles E. Phillips Jr., the Oracle co-president who acknowledged an affair after being displayed with an ex-girlfriend on New York billboards, is stepping down from Morgan Stanley’s board and will not seek re-election.
snippet: Charles E. Phillips Jr., the Oracle co-president who acknowledged an affair after being displayed with an ex-girlfriend on New York billboards, is stepping down from Morgan Stanley’s board and will not seek re-election.
lead_paragraph: Charles E. Phillips Jr., the Oracle co-president who acknowledged an affair after being displayed with an ex-girlfriend on New York billboards, is stepping down from Morgan Stanley’s board and will not seek re-election, Bloomberg News reports, citing a regulatory filing.

headline.main: Oracle Co-President to Leave Morgan Stanley’s Board
